name: Excavator Transporter Rescue 3D Simulator- Be ready to rescue cars in this extreme high powered excavator transporter game
name_original: Excavator Transporter Rescue 3D Simulator- Be ready to rescue cars in this extreme high powered excavator transporter game
description:
Look out! There’s a landslide ahead and long lines of cars are stuck between heaps of debris! Gear up for a rescue operation like never before and be ready to operate a heavy excavator transporter in extreme conditions. The road is in bad shape and automobiles are struggling to find their way through the rubble.

A Heavy duty Excavator is a high powered metal vehicle designed to carry out earth moving tasks that require brutal force and deep excavation of rocks, dirt and debris from the earth. The hydraulic heavy excavator performs on heavy construction sites and is crafted to work in deep trenches with great power. The task is to use this giant machine to remove the blockage caused by the landslide.

The landslide has brought down with it huge rocks and the dangerous landscape is bringing down another challenge on you. The steep hilly area is no easy track to drive on, and when the task is to efficiently clear out the debris for scores of cars of pass by safely, the game steps up another level!

Accept the challenge of an extreme driver who can demonstrate driving skills to pave the way for smooth traffic, without harming a single piece of metal. Your skills will be tested at this real rescue job and you will feel the adrenaline rush when you are laboriously removing the landside rubble.

Gameplay:

The heavy excavator haulage is equipped with hydraulic controls that will help you dig out the landslide debris with precision. The excavator digger includes all hydraulic operations : planetary, winch, elevation, rotation and extension. Use them to your advantage, and experience easy manoeuvring of steering controls to removed road blockage as quickly as possible.
Next, transfer them into the dumper truck and keep going till the road is clear and wide open for cars to move. Hurry up! No one fancies a long traffic jam!

The landslide wreckage is not an easy one to play with because this is no hilly area. During the game you need to be able to keep the heavy duty excavator transporter on track and ensure that the terrain is not getting in the way of your operation.
Automatic control switches and 3D animations will make your rescue operation all the more interesting. Driving simulation enthusiasts will love excelling the challenges in this highly detail graphics game.

Features:
High Definition 3D Graphics
Detailed landslide animation and scene setting
Hydraulic controls on high powered vehicles
Challenging tasks during rescue operation
